<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mist Escape](/Feats.aspx?ID=3555) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 59</row>

**Archetype** [Vampire](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=181)

**Prerequisites**
[Turn to Mist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3553); [Coffin Bound](/Feats.aspx?ID=3554)

**Trigger**
You are reduced to 0 HP.

</column>

---

As you fall, your body reacts to defend itself. You Turn to Mist. This doesn't expend a use of Turn to Mist, and you can use Mist Escape even if you've already Turned to Mist in the same day. You take [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) actions to move directly toward your coffin even though you are at 0 HP, though you aren't conscious and don't have control over how you do so. While at 0 HP in this form, you are unaffected by further damage. You automatically return to your corporeal form, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), if you reach your coffin or after 1 hour when you are destroyed, whichever one comes first.
name: Mist Escape
